channel.title: People are duping on my server... How?
channel.description:
I dont have dueling, I have autoban on setitem....
How are people duping... Seems to be a trade bugg? Because I see 2 guys keep trading eachother over and over and every time they get +1 of the item they traded....
I am using Devolution (Dodian).
Any ideas? Please

item.title: People are duping on my server... How?
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

How can I add the click delay on the Confirm button on 2nd screen?

I got this I am not sure if I am lookign at the right thing.

			case 13218:
				client other = getClient(trade_reqId);
				if (!validClient(trade_reqId))
					break;
				if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastButton < 1000) {
					lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
					break;
				} else {
					lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
				}
				lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
				if (inTrade && tradeConfirmed && other.tradeConfirmed
						&& !tradeConfirmed2) {
					lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis();
					tradeConfirmed2 = true;
					
					if (other.tradeConfirmed2) {
						giveItems();
						other.giveItems();
						break;
					}
					other.sendQuest("Other player has accepted.", 3535);
					sendQuest("Waiting for other player...", 3535);
				}
				break;

Is that the code I need to put it in?

If so how? Because I added a actiondelay and i can still keep clickign the confirm button over and over.

Read full topic
item.source: People are duping on my server... How?

item.title: People are duping on my server... How?
item.dc:creator: @poorscape poorscape
item.description:
@poorscape wrote:

remove hammers from gen. stores.
that gets rid of setitem all along.

i had to do that with mine.
they can still smith, just not use bar on anvil.

have a low lvl monster drop D[] shiled halves so they use right on left and it raises smithing. (keeps smithing in the game and gets rid of duping by setitem.)

Read full topic

item.source: People are duping on my server... How?

item.title: People are duping on my server... How?
item.dc:creator: @Carson Carson
item.description:
@Carson wrote:

How i dupe is, i trade stuff over from one account to another one of mine, (Both clients open) and then bank the stuff, and quickly log out.

And when i log in i have the stuff in my bank and in my inve.

I’ll post a video, Luls.

Read full topic

item.title: People are duping on my server... How?
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

if it isn’t an ip-ban for setitem then it wont work

if you setitem, then get banned

then log onto a new character, the item you set is still set =\

item.source: People are duping on my server... How?

item.title: People are duping on my server... How?
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

I removed dueling from right-click option, by searching in my client.java “trade with” and below that there should be duel, highlight the whole duel text until you get to the start of the attack text. Also remove all bankers from the server. Remove hammers from the shop.

Hope i helped.

Thanx

Read full topic
item.source: People are duping on my server... How?

item.title: People are duping on my server... How?
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

Dueling in wild is disabled on my server, there is another way…

Some guy told me if its laggy and they put item in trade then take it out fast it thinks that its still there and they end up with 1 in trade and 1 in inv.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @sriyegna sriyegna
item.description:
@sriyegna wrote:

well i think its like this…

u trade someone
they accept the trade
u accept the trade
then they accept the second trade thing (confirmation)
and u decline the second one …
